title: Vronsky and Babin. Part one
creator_credit: Artists Films, Walter Lowendahl and S.K. Winston
brief_description: Part one of a two-part series. The internationally famous duo-pianists, Vitya Vronsky and Victor Babin, play “Waltz in A Flat” by Brahms; “Waltz” by Arensky; and “Flight of the Bumble Bee” by Rimsky-Korsakoff.
